markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Imprint Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=698)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 74</row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts [_object reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=553) on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a [_retrocognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=260) spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions.

 If the object is targeted with [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) of a higher spell level than _imprint message_, the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you Cast this Spell, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of _imprint message_ fade.
name: Imprint Message

summary_markdown: Put a false psychic imprint on an object.
text: Imprint Message Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 221 2.0 , Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn pg. 74 Tradition Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 object --- You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts object reading on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a retrocognition spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions. If the object is targeted with read aura of a higher spell level than imprint message , the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you Cast this Spell, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of imprint message fade.
